title: Print, ca. 1670
medium: Etching with engraving on white laid paper
description: Two Indian girls dance to the music of a lute player, on a platform which is supported by half-figures of harpies.  Snakes hiss at plants in pots supported by puttos.  The original signature "Loire fecit" in the bottom center.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, ca. 1670.Etching with engraving on white laid paper. 1944-16-6.
